meanings.definition: In a loud and harsh manner
meanings.sent1: The children laughed raucously during the comedy show.
meanings.sent2: The band played raucously at the rock concert.
meanings.sent3: The parrot squawked raucously, mimicking the sound of a car alarm.
meanings.sent4: The thunder rumbled raucously, shaking the windows.
meanings.sent5: The alarm blared raucously, waking up the entire neighborhood.

meanings.definition: Making or constituting a disturbingly harsh and loud noise
meanings.sent1: The raucously barking dog disturbed the peaceful evening.
meanings.sent2: The raucously honking car caused a commotion on the street.
meanings.sent3: The old printer made a raucously loud noise every time it printed.
meanings.sent4: The raucously howling wind echoed through the empty streets.
meanings.sent5: The raucously buzzing bee scared the children in the garden.
